QuestData.Title: An Unexpected Gift
QuestData.Description: This is wonderful! It's just the kind of thing I need to remind me of home while I continue my studies in the Temple of the Moon. I'll try out one of the recipes tonight. I can't wait!$B$BWould you take this short note of thanks back to Nyoma? You can hire a hippogryph to take you back to Dolanaar. Just visit our hippogryph master, Leora, when you're ready to leave. She'll help you get a ride back to Dolanaar.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Sister Aquinne's Note to Leora, the hippogryph master in Darnassus.
QuestData.CompletionText: Are you ready to return to Dolanaar?
QuestData.RewardText: Do you need a ride back to Dolanaar?
